document.full_text: ninety-nine pre-columbian artifacts were returned to panamanian president ricardo martinelli by u.s. customs officials on wednesday after an investigation that has lasted over a decade.
document.title: pre-columbian pottery returned to panama's president
lines_and_colors: ninety-nine pre-columbian artifacts were returned to panamanian president ricardo martinelli by u.s. customs officials on wednesday after an investigation that has lasted over a decade.
